Synopsis: Get a more detailed AD site report.
Description: This command will present a summary report of your Active Directory sites showing a description, associated subnets, and when the site object was created and last modified.

Examples.Title: Example 1
Examples.Code:
PS C:\> Get-ADSiteDetail


   Name: Default-First-Site-Name

Description        Subnets                 Created                Modified
-----------        -------                 -------                --------
Home Office        {192.168.3.0/24, 19... 2/23/2021 3:36:58 PM   2/23/2021...


   Name: NoCal

Description        Subnets                 Created                Modified
-----------        -------                 -------                --------
Bay Area Office    172.17.0.0/16           2/23/2021 3:38:33 PM   2/23/2021...
